tool_description: Ranks and prioritizes work orders based on urgency, SLA requirements, customer tier, and business impact factors.

work_order_ids.description: List of work order IDs to rank

ranking_criteria.description: Primary ranking method: sla_deadline, customer_tier, urgency, business_impact

error_messages: Invalid work order list: One or more work order IDs do not exist or are not in assignable state
Invalid ranking criteria: Use one of [sla_deadline, customer_tier, urgency, business_impact]
Insufficient ranking data: Some work orders lack data needed for the selected ranking criteria
usage: Provide work order IDs and select ranking criteria to get prioritized assignment order. Use secondary_criteria to handle ties in primary ranking.

ranked_order.description: Work order IDs in priority ranking order (highest to lowest)

priority_scores.description: Numerical priority scores for each work order

sla_violations.description: Work order IDs at risk of SLA violation

highest_priority.description: Work order ID with highest priority
